alert.note: Alert for Southeast Webster (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 10:34PM EST until January 10 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 7 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, with locally higher amounts possible on the favored west facing slopes. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Southeast Webster County. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 7 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage, along with blowing and drifting of snowfall.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Additional information can be found at https://www.weather.gov/rlx as well as on our Facebook and Twitter pages.
